param.name: destination
param.comment: Destination. can be a space or an object in a zone. Providing Sector and Cluster will attempt to find the nearest zone

param.name: position
param.comment: Position. position is treated as an offset to destination. Default: safe position on [0,0,0] of destination

param.name: rotation
param.comment: Rotation. rotation the ship should have - overrides lookat

param.name: lookat
param.comment: Look at. position the ship should point to - overridden by rotation

param.name: noboost
param.comment: No boosting. set true to prevent ships boosting

param.name: disablecollisionavoidance
param.comment: Disable collision avoidance. HACK - disable collision-avoidance for this ship

param.name: abortpath
param.comment: Abort path. disable aborting existing path

param.name: forcesteering
param.comment: Force steering. force steering flight control model

param.name: endintargetzone
param.comment: End in target zone. complete this script if we are in the correct zone, no matter where

param.name: activepatrol
param.comment: Active patrol. Should subordinates actively engage any targets at the target location?

param.name: recallsubordinates
param.comment: recall subordinates and cancel the recall of subordinates. disabled in the move.generic call from move.gate

param.name: strictblacklist
param.comment: Enforce sector blacklist even if no path is possible. Should only be true if the ship does an order that results from an automated behavior.

param.name: precise
param.comment: Skips safepos and position randomization. Do not use if moving multiple ships to the same position. ignored if position param is not populated.

param.name: playerprecise
param.comment: Skips position randomization but does safepos. Do not use if moving multiple ships to the same position. ignored if position param is not populated.

param.name: waitforatgate
param.comment: Wait for object with this component ID after crossing every gate to the destination. Passed to move.gate. Only works if at least one gate is crossed.

param.name: uselocalhighways
param.comment: Allow usage of local highways as appropriate. Note that L and XL ships will still not use local highways. Do not set to false when destination is a local highway or in a local highway.

param.name: changecommandaction
param.comment: Allow this script to change commandaction

param.name: targetclasses
param.comment: classes of valid targets used in conjunction with activepatrol

param.name: radius
param.comment: do not engage if target is beyond this distance relative to radiusanchorpos in radiusanchorspace. only used with activepatrol.

param.name: stopondetect
param.comment: component ID. stop movement when object detected by gravidar unless $endintargetzone is true and we are not in the same zone.

param.name: allowwreck
param.comment: moves to destination even if destination is wrecked.

param.name: debugchance
param.comment: Print debug output

param.name: kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk
kAAITParam_isStepForwardWithdraw
noboost
param.value: if @$kAAIT_enemyAvoid.exists and @this.assignedcontrolled.distanceto.{$kAAIT_enemyAvoid} lt [@this.assignedcontrolled.maxradarrange,[@this.assignedcontrolled.maxcombatrange.all,@$kAAIT_enemyAvoid.maxcombatrange.all].max].min then true else false
